description: The round payoff this round was 92. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 69.
Choosing option 2 when the opponent cooperates (option 1) maximizes individual payoff (75% of the round payoff), creating a strong temptation to defect.
The game mirrors a prisoner's dilemma: mutual cooperation yields balanced payoffs, but unilateral defection offers higher rewards at the other's expense, while mutual defection is worst for both.
